Can you imagine your FRIEND, fucking and impregnating your MARRIED mother after blackmailing you both with pictures of something embarrassing (even if its taboo)? Then proceeding to tell his dad about it (after lying about getting rid of the evidence)? Then his father and his fucking COWORKERS nail your mom right in front of you and have the audacity to say "do this at home kids"? GTFO with that shit. And people will say, "iT's OnLy MaNgA, iT's FaKe" Yeah, true, but that doesn't make it less fucked up.
